entry.title: U.S. and Allies Vow Action Over Reports of Russian Atrocities in Ukraine
entry.content: Biden calls for war crimes trial, says Putin must be held accountable, as Ukrainians recount brutality of occupation.

entry.title: Ukraine War Drives Countries to Embrace Renewable Energy---but Not Yet
entry.content: Many nations are speeding up plans to transition to green energy, such as wind and solar power, in their quest to replace Russian supplies. In the near term, theyâ€™re leaning even more on oil, gas and coal.
